comment: Maxine Waters is seemily lacking in herabilityto unite people of all colors, religions, or creeds together as exemplified by her divisional and biotry that sets her up there with the likes of Sneaky Al Sharpton. Apparently Martin Luther King and his philosophy of uniting, and kindness didnt impress Maxine in her long political, and criminal time in politics!

                  :ARG1-of (s2 / seem-01))

                  :ARG1 p
